testcase.classname: I am automation functionality of Add Jobs in Orange HRM application
testcase.name: Add Jobs
testcase.system-out: Given User launch chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login".passed And User enters username as "Admin" and password as "admin123"..............passed Then Create Job Record......................................................passed When Click on logout button.................................................passed Then Close Browser..........................................................passed
